content.rendered:
U.S. Government Resources

  • The Ghana Office of the U.S. Commercial Service
  • The U.S. Commercial Service 
  • Export.gov
  • The Advocacy Center
  • Export-Import Bank of the United States
  • Country Limitation Schedule 
  • Development Finance Corporation
  • Trade and Development Agency
  • SBA’s Office of International Trade 
  • USDA Commodity Credit Corporation
  • U.S. Agency for International Development 
  • USAID West Africa Trade Hub 
  • Office of the U.S. Trade Representative 
  • Millennium Challenge Corporation
  • StopFakes – U.S. government resource for IPR information and assistance
  • United States International Trade Commission
  • Bureau of Economic & Business Affairs – US Department of State
  • Sanctions Programs and Country Information – U.S. Department of Treasury 
  • CIA World Fact Book
  • Federal Trade Commission

Other Resources

  • American Chamber of Commerce Ghana
  • The Association of Ghana Industries
  • Organization for Economic Cooperation and Development (OECD) 
  • World Bank
